name: Le Tool UPo - DEMO -alfa
description:
Le Tool UPo is my project for a final exams.

To be exact only the demo is, but I'm planing to work on it even after the exams and complete it.

The version you are playing now is in alfa phase. There still many visual placeholders and the story is practicly missing.

Anyway I would be glad if after playing (or even during) you found some time to write how did you enjoyed the game.

If there were any bugs, grammar mistakes in text, if the game was to easy or hard and I'm even not against some suggestions.

Please, if you would like to write something from abow, write on top of your comment with Caps Lock one word title (e.g.: GRAMMAR, BUG, SUGGESTION,....), so I can keep better track of them.

Thank you for clicking on and playing my game. :)
